alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Fayette; Harris; Heard; Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 4:24PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fayette, northwestern Meriwether, southeastern Heard, Troup, Coweta and northwestern Harris Counties through 500 PM EST... At 423 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Dunaway Gardens to near Sturkie, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Newnan, LaGrange, Fayetteville, Peachtree City, Tyrone, West Point, Senoia, Hogansville, Grantville, Luthersville, Brooks, Moreland, Sharpsburg, Turin, Haralson, Woolsey, Lone Oak, East Newnan, Corinth and Louise. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Coweta; Fayette; Harris; Heard; Meriwether; Troup
